content: {"name": "Ben Hill United Methodist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The pantry will be closed if a public holiday falls before or after the distribution day,\nRequests for assistance are ONLY received on the 1st Tuesday of the month at 404-927-9883 (voicemail) between 8:30am \u2013 10:30am", "email": "", "url": "https://www.benhillumc.org/outreach/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2099 Fairburn Road Southwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Atlanta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30331", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.6979513, "longitude": -84.5103757}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 344-0618", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}]}
